name: The Great Gatsby
title: A novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that explores themes of decadence and excess in the Jazz Age.

title: Harper Lee's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.

title: J.D. Salinger's iconic novel about teenage angst and alienation.

title: George Orwell's dystopian novel about totalitarianism and surveillance.

name: Pride and Prejudice
title: Jane Austen's classic novel about love, reputation, and class in early 19th-century England.
author: Jane Austen

name: The Hobbit
title: J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved fantasy novel about the adventures of Bilbo Baggins.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

name: The Alchemist
title: Paulo Coelho's philosophical novel about following one's dreams.
author: Paulo Coelho

name: Becoming
title: Michelle Obama's memoir, detailing her life from childhood to her years as First Lady.
author: Michelle Obama

name: Educated
title: Tara Westover's memoir about growing up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho and her quest for knowledge.
author: Tara Westover

name: The Silent Patient
title: Alex Michaelides' psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after committing a violent crime.
author: Alex Michaelides

name: Where the Crawdads Sing
title: Delia Owens' novel about a young girl raised in the marshes of North Carolina and her connection to nature.
author: Delia Owens

title: A novel by Markus Zusak set in Nazi Germany narrated by Death.

name: The Da Vinci Code
title: Dan Brown's thrilling mystery novel that blends art, history, and religion.

name: The Hunger Games
title: Suzanne Collins' dystopian novel about survival and rebellion in a totalitarian society.

name: Fahrenheit 451
title: Ray Bradbury's classic novel about a future society where books are banned.

name: The Fault in Our Stars
title: John Green's poignant love story between two teenagers who meet in a cancer support group.

name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Stephen Chbosky's coming-of-age novel about the struggles of adolescence.

name: The Night Circus
title: Erin Morgenstern's enchanting tale of a magical competition between two young illusionists.
